id.tags: Dev | React | JavaScript | TypeScript | HTML | CSS | Node.js | Web System

sobre.quemEuSou: My name is Monique Duarte, I am 29 years old, and I am a Postgraduate student in Software Engineering. Additionally, I am a Zootecnia graduate from UFPel and have a Master's degree from USP. Currently, I am seeking an opportunity to work as a junior developer. I have fallen in love with technology and am always motivated by curiosity and the constant pursuit of learning, especially in the fields of development, automation, AI, and innovation. I am the kind of person who, if I don't know something, will learn or solve the problem, always willing to add value wherever I am.
sobre.atualmente: Currently, I am interning in the support and front-end area, working with the support and engineering team in project analysis and quality. My focus is on finding automated solutions, learning with React, and testing to optimize processes and improve work efficiency, both for myself and my colleagues.
sobre.objetivos: I am always looking for new challenges and opportunities to apply and expand my knowledge. My main goal at the moment is to gain experience and grow professionally in the programming field, expanding my skills and solidifying my career in technology.
